items.title: The Procter & Gamble Company (PG): Jim Cramer’s Defensive Darling – Will P&G Lead the Flight to Safety?
items.description: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Reveals What’s Next After Tariffs & Discusses These 10 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. In his appearance on CNBC’s Squawk on the Street on Thursday, […]
